original title: Pahili Sher, Dusri Savvasher, Navara Pavsher
plot outline: It's a story portraying Pandu's struggle to maintain peace in his family. Pandu is happily married to Kamala. However, because Kamala could not give him a child, Pandu decides to marry another woman, Malkin. Trouble begins for Pandu for sharing time between the two demanding wives who pretend to be one above the other. Kamala and Malki fight for their rights making Pandu hilariously sandwiched in this battle. What follow is a great comedy and funny one liners..

The film is a story portraying Pandu's struggle to maintain peace in his family. Pandu happily married to Kamala marries another woman, Malki, because Kamala could not bear him a child. Trouble begins for Pandu for sharing time between the two demanding wives, who act one above the other. Kamala and Malki fight for their rights, leaving Pandu hilariously sandwiched in this war.
